ap2.prepare.game_cannot_be_played: Unfortunately, %s can't be played at the moment... Therefore it will be skipped.
game.ap2.title: ArcadeParty
game.ap2.spleef.description: Break the ground beneath your opponents to make them fall. Last one standing wins.
game.ap2.bow_spleef.description:
Shoot your bow to break the ground beneath your opponents 
to make them fall. 
Use your double jump to be the last one standing.
game.ap2.mirror_hop.description: Make your way over the platforms towards the goal. Only one platform is correct!
game.ap2.fine_tuning.description:
Tune note blocks so that they play a given melody.
Whoever tunes their note blocks most accurate wins!
game.ap2.fine_tuning.controls.title: Controls
game.ap2.one_in_the_chamber.description: Your crossbow one hits, but you only have one shot! Gain another by killing someone. First reaching %s kills wins!
game.ap2.anvil_fall.description:
Dodge the anvils falling from the sky.
Be the last one remaining!
game.ap2.treasure_hunter.description: Search for a treasure in a big pile of sand. First one to find the chest wins!
game.ap2.panda_finder.description: Find a panda from a picture. First player with %s points wins.
game.ap2.panda_finder.cooldown: Do not guess pandas so often!
game.ap2.jump_and_run.description: Complete a randomly generated jump 'n' run. If you make it first, you win!
game.ap2.jump_and_run.assistance: This room has been simplified so that you can make better progress
game.ap2.tnt_run.description: The blocks beneath your feet are disappearing. Prevent yourself from falling by running away!
game.ap2.hot_potato.description: A random player will receive the hot potato. The potato can be given to other players. After %s seconds, the player with the hot potato is eliminated.
game.ap2.hot_potato.title: You
game.ap2.hot_potato.subtitle: are the hot potato
game.ap2.block_dissolve.description: The world is slowly crumbling. Use snowballs to knock players of the map. Last one standing wins!
game.ap2.chicken_shooter.description:
Shoot as many chickens as possible!
Baby chickens award more points,
tnt chickens take out chickens around them!
game.ap2.cozy_campfire.description: Your team has a campfire which mustn't burn out. Refill it with burnable items from the map! If your campfire burns out, you lose!
game.ap2.mining_battle.description: Mine as much ores as possible! There are also special blocks with extra effects.
game.ap2.mining_battle.haste: You gained the haste status effect!
game.ap2.knockout.description: Punch your enemies into the void. The knock-back gets increasingly stronger the more a player is hit.
game.ap2.musical_minecart.description: Enter a minecart when the music stops playing, in order to survive. Last player standing wins.
game.ap2.guess_it.description: You will be asked several quizzes. The closer you get to the answer, the more points you receive.
game.ap2.guess_it.input.int: Your input '%s' is not not a valid integer.
game.ap2.guess_it.input.float: Your input '%s' is not not a valid decimal number.
game.ap2.guess_it.input.daytime: Your input '%s' is not not a valid time. Try 13:30 or 1:30 pm
game.ap2.guess_it.input.option: Your input '%s' is not not a valid option. Input a letter %s-%s.
game.ap2.guess_it.already_answered: This quiz can only be answered once.
game.ap2.guess_it.daytime.guess: What is the current time of day? e.g. 18:00 or 6 pm:
game.ap2.guess_it.mob.guess: How many entities of type %s are there in the arena?
game.ap2.guess_it.mob_types.guess: How many different types of entities are there in the arena?
game.ap2.guess_it.cake_bites: How many pieces were eaten from this cake?
game.ap2.guess_it.potion_type: What type of potion is that?
game.ap2.guess_it.food_amount: How much hunger does this food restore?
game.ap2.guess_it.armor_trim: What type of armor trim is that?
game.ap2.guess_it.shape.sphere: How many blocks are there in this sphere?
game.ap2.guess_it.shape.cube: How many blocks are there in this cube?
game.ap2.guess_it.shape.cone: How many blocks are there in this cone?
game.ap2.guess_it.minecart: How many seconds will pass until the minecart reaches the goal?
game.ap2.pig_race.description: Race for the finish line while riding on a pig.
game.ap2.red_light_green_light.descripti: Run towards the finish line. You may only move if you are commanded to do so!
game.ap2.red_light_green_light.goal: %s reached the goal. The game will end in %s seconds and you will be ranked depending on your distance to the goal.
game.ap2.red_light_green_light.moved: You moved! You were reset as a punishment.
game.ap2.snowball_fight.description: Collect snow from the ground. Hit your opponents with the snowballs. Last one standing wins!
game.ap2.speed_builders.description: Build a structure as quickly as possible. Each round, the player whose building is the least similar to the original is eliminated.
game.ap2.speed_builders.label: Copy the structure
game.ap2.mimicry.description: Repeat a sequence of button presses in the correct order. If you make a mistake, you are eliminated.
game.ap2.splashy_dropper.description: Drop into pools of water. You earn points depending on the size of the pool you land in. Pools disappear when someone lands in them.
game.ap2.glowing_bomb.description: A glowstone bomb is passed between the players. If it explodes while you have it, glowstone will be put into your respawn anchor. You are eliminated if your respawn anchor is full!
